title: Lakers Earn NBA Finals Game 4 Win Over Heat | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Tjarks convene right after the tight and scrappy Game 4 of the NBA Finals to talk about the Lakers’ win to go up 3-1 in the series (0:32) and the Finals MVP race (32:57).

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Jonathan Tjarks
